id="b69f4a48539edd2c438341715747400d" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="34e9aef6755ca9dc3103ca25f2c1b94c" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="7f056f7e3d9ba5170e3d973201d6e577" class="ne-p"><br></p><ul class="ne-ul"><li id="5525a064edc2a71505894af900e9ae6d"><span class="ne-text">init</span></li><li id="655f909b3a436f6c5d0b2f6ce577f1eb"><span class="ne-text"> fork</span></li></ul><ul class="ne-ul"><li id="15f97be6f701a9d2e285ce067dcaa4f5"><span class="ne-text"> UNIX  X</span></li><li id="9cbc72a5195fe8f27a433e2cf1537410"><span class="ne-text"></span></li></ul><p id="734b1131d138309cb8f6e8751b24b0ca" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="36bcfdf4e40be363d8ec64c87f794ea4" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p class="ne-text">fork</span></code><span class="ne-text"> fork </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="40b362f7c35397f6ed004f88fc15b256" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="8ca0bc63e686352cfce2b4e04f846f34" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> Windows  Win32  </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">CreateProcess</span></code><span class="ne-text"> 10 </span><strong><span class="ne-text"> Windows </span></strong><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="c760fc897fd7f21d634e5d2c5ab8dd50" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="24ee23f9"><span class="ne-text">   UNIX  </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">exit</span></code><span class="ne-text">  Windows  </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">ExitProcess</span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></li><li id="64851a07fdbb717aabe3e48e41e69418"><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">()</span></code><span class="ne-text">TerminateProcess</span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></li></ul><p id="5bd73c750876718c6aca8ef216af6b54" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="59a65ba2"><span table)</span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="d3d512edb88e5511bf9ce1530b15e0f8" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="650b4ebec7f6635f2b6ff4cc027a95fe" class="ne-p"><span id="31823d31c3e4c8a1d3e9c4053e65166f" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="70941018fd44652b5554c9be911f4bb4" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="74b4ad9f0cf425a882479e7b9fccc210" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="446a4e049bb4f8b4e6d08161a35277b5" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> CPU </span></p><p id="15f0ff35b5546621cdfa2a7240307b67" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="26e17fd6"><span class="ne-text"></span></h3><p id="b5ee17fce17b6cdbe43273512e22ecb9" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="63976c7cc6bac642a93b4f69c61c73b7" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="a817d6cedfd6372e5126592d084db2cd" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="065866846bc241326c1231ae19b4e8c3" class="ne-p"><img class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="46d3024237e6c858dddb4620413c3f9d" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="cafd9a2584fc98d82c47a69f4eb4a44a" class="ne-p"><br></p><h2 id="13747cb9"><span class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">(Inter Process Communication, IPC)</span></code><span class="ne-text">  6 </span></p><p id="dfe97806c12fe7f893011f144d1a8165" class="ne-p"><br></p><p </span></p><p id="77a00de06ad8a313624bebd7197daab0" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="c3a46e2f457eb12ac07b2735125ed640" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> Linux  </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="1e0b0c18d976e2cb412fe31f463b0b70" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">SIGSTOP</span></code><span class="ne-text">  </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">SIGKILL</span></code><span class="ne-text"> SIGSTOP SIGKILL </span></p><p id="f463e7202028da7ee34fa86439d2d0bc" class="ne-p"><br></p><p pipe</span></h3><p id="e581372206c587ee595cd8880c7fe68c" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="7d6b1edbc43ab03cd76e374db13b3d79" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text">Linux  pipe </span></p><p </span></p><p id="9135a0a2091dee1a4cfbf8c684405913" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="72b83631"><span class="ne-text"> shared memory</span></h3><p id="b441fd0f50991bc8fbdb133ed2bfecc1" class="ne-text"></span></h4><p id="454ce166479faf6b0bac6a5a1d950fc0" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="3e7328aa85fbda7ea81e5451ecd63f55" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> 1  9  2  1  90 %  CPU  2  10 %  CPU </span></p><p id="247ab6cb450a5c6c2432cec96ed7ec6e" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="a8997400e66c5b2d256fccc7ea3776bf" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text">CPU  50%  CPU  CPU </span></p><p </span></p><p id="e7a4fdba97874bdf3ba1bbbcc25d17b6" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="cc2fe27785e322231e1760788dacd2e8" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"> </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">R ()</span></code><span class="ne-text"> </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">READ ONLY</span></code><span class="ne-text">  M  </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">READ/WRITE</span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="1cdfab7830fe96b8bd64eba745fa4f54" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="8dac468a9941b20f7d32592bf3233e15" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> R  M  0R </span></p><p id="6f7fbf64554353465ff29f99860787b3" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="39bab2fdc8db36d5ebb838bbc9610a1e" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> R  M </span></p><p id="abc034f6c92699f9fbdd74ea4d336581" class="ne-p"><br></p><ul class="ne-ul"><li class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="3639cbe3d0887d2760c552159b6ac088" class="ne-p"><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">NRU(Not Recently Used)</span></code><span class="ne-text">  20 msNRU </span><strong><span class="ne-text"></span></strong><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="e69f0a756fab88cc1ab941d6eb5f0429" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="ef992930"><span class="ne-text"></span></h3><p id="b54cfe45e7d8a2900b5ab6e37cac9c7d" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="cedbd31bfca554665ded81b0817e03ff" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">FIFO(First-In,First-Out)</span></code><span class="ne-text"> </span></p><p id="017b429504dba6c1df0a023aed81995c" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="fbe44333"><span class="ne-text"></span></h3><p id="dec3701d79739bc3cf2072c3170b98e4" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="b0f6d433a3bf62769df7a29957f2f42f" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> FIFO </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"> check </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"> </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">R </span></code><span class="ne-text"> 0  R  1</span></p><p id="d6333e220f33af321d74ec854f04b55a" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="089f8f24e153eee75e5e435a679afa1e" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">(second chance)</span></code><span class="ne-text"> A  H </span></p><p id="a28bcb1486944b773b50fcf51df4749c" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="fde6e179989ecc6f697670c740914dce" class="ne-p"><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2021/png/1484158/1609726830001-d17523cc-7d04-4aa5-9b91-7cb47cc26508.png" width="731" </span></p><p id="d4f6ff6d0e62a25ca2d68a7c83d9af63" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="68d96662"><span class="ne-text"></span></h3><p id="e267d3840df18b33c8d7169b8089f9f5" class="ne-p"><br></p><p Windows </span></p><p id="715200795b1099f573c996fc4f5ade2c" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="e40d5e148ce0e55c7c15939cc5e60d7c" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> b  </span><strong><span class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">(Superblock)</span></code><span class="ne-text">  4096  4096 </span></p><p id="1476e552c3b10f8582475439b1afb325" class="ne-p"><br></p><ul class="ne-ul"><li class="ne-text">0101160000111000000110</span></p><p id="0af159c768142dd2b260c453127538c0" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="093caab837a37d141b3925293bf9714d" class="ne-p"><img File System, VFS)</span></code><span class="ne-text">  VFS </span></p><p id="adaba32ebb0cc75090b68328c3028b7b" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="a3c0af3bdad2c2390baf7ba0b99cc521" class="ne-p"><img class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">POSIX </span></code><span class="ne-text"> openreadwrite  seek VFS  </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text">  POSIX </span></p><p id="b00daf97b264c2c2bbe03d1961ade40f" class="ne-p"><br></p><h2 id="9bc5cc8b"><span class="ne-text"></span></h2><p id="e52554121a51cb24a7d18cea51ff1273" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="2ddbfc7d676fa2fb7e22874efb2691cf" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="72ecbbb431e26da743b3582748db5218" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span><strong><span class="ne-text"> n </span></strong><span class="ne-text"></span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"> </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"> </span></p><p id="dd7036c30b5429f0012e299634b76e92" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="67ddc9963643581de7e3a7a9dc7fc649" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="344a106798ca8fae42c7928b5ec1fc77" class="ne-p"><br></p><h4 id="e30f1fa9"><span class="ne-text"></span></h4><p id="38509e646d595c8ff6d9a8436e3eedaf" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="547a3489e12fa9b51d40fb6441101da0" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span><strong><span class="ne-text"></span></strong><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="eef07e9a93ba53842388a4f3930178df" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="db7ed5c40d46b10feac962743c5d08dc" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> 1 </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"></span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"></span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"></span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="c2835cdef3fed7ded33775fbb7ca6297" class="ne-p"><br></p><h4 id="295e0480"><span class="ne-text"></span></h4><p id="edd1908809f46d895dc025e523270a52" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="dd215e9d3aec5bd07fefcbb6ef543dc8" class="ne-p"><span </span></code><span class="ne-text"> DMA DMA  DMA </span></p><p id="9872ff0e8287271e0167ad5fe4904890" class="ne-p"><br></p><h4 id="fb19257e"><span class="ne-text">DMA </span></h4><p id="988a05fc57bbc139ee60ade19db59775" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="a747f027f15ed77d2cb1885a1e205177" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text">DMA </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text"></span></code><span class="ne-text"> DMA  CPU  DMA  DMA </span></p><p id="07fa0e231d1e259cf61d47eec043f097" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="5db6af288a1595b279c38f3dfc63fbe9" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text">DMA  0  2 -  4  0 DMA  CPU </span></p><p id="9e6195abe1061d23e1d4d22ae3d6afa8" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="88738ca6"><span class="ne-text"></span></h3><p class="ne-p"><br></p><h4 id="a032d055"><span class="ne-text"></span></h4><p id="0373af03e43a5a5ef1859377c0c633d9" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="91b406cc3a3758fb324eb8607af4e8f2" class="ne-p"><span independence)</span></code><span class="ne-text"></span><strong><span class="ne-text"></span></strong><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="d82bc7d1671e4c56ae19ad479cb3d7f2" class="ne-p"><br></p><p Q</span></li></ul><p id="e0dd1db8bb6fec97312e991f0c0702d6" class="ne-p"><br></p><h4 id="a0c9482b"><span class="ne-text"></span></h4><p id="603ffce150e2fc1d987dcfd88ae12f0e" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="2892a91ceec697d1af55116f4eed65ed" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">(low-levvel format)</span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="7462d9403fc3252905f5a028434ad7c1"><span class="ne-text"> - </span></li><li id="5f7257bc3d72ff601be446ec912b45ca"><span class="ne-text"> - </span></li></ul><ul class="ne-ul"><li id="2be1b7ef29e9defa9d00b39f69ec3494"><span class="ne-text"></span></li></ul><p id="2b370356fac399fe05f109995162a179" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="0dc67d0cf7fad6f14c4ad3b58f27915e" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="91c6c8ce16ce7b9388de0e43ef253a37" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="8d11395ec1947cc3a0b7ab12754b4328" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">(First-Come, First-served, FCFS)</span></code><span class="ne-text"> </span></p><p id="7d18009d76c74dd7b8db33951c729bd5" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="c10ff5cc598f273b4133beab2f7333d7" class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">(SSF)</span></code><span class="ne-text"> </span></p><p id="32b5296ec1d24eb2a7d5a6939088ad43" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="9b84f8da5378b036c6c206344a7a7154" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> 6  11 , 2 , 4, 14, 8, 15, 3 </span></p><p id="807006c94eac31f179e807c72677c14d" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="139b589cb34fee0e242e2a53b569c729" class="ne-p"><img id="c34052de"><span class="ne-text"></span></h2><p id="225135e8a2070f389de38812717eb75d" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="f06571b2cb07e67da53eb1f9ae46f666" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="14ee619ccacc077fbb0ab230f795ff08" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="845b19bd"><span class="ne-text"></span></h3><p id="8856acadce3e4be26400996c75037a18" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="1dce1bbff3adfcf55a761b49b459a9a9" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="7aa26a189549bf96df754b2f1ace77ae" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="ae3dd6af307505c10b0eb562a80986f1" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="57bb0ac633cecdfa908fa75afa54cbdc" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="ad5e4cd721b90f28101f2acd23afe3bb" class="ne-p"><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2021/png/1484158/1609726830848-f4bc59e7-89e2-4e78-909c-e8dcd1718ebe.png" width="475" id="TYPR7" class="ne-image"></p><p id="2745a826110fc96a2b6216f300175397" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="32c152b4a1b42accb3ee8f73ca42fd9a" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="00db8fb2a967b493da00c952b7385bb2" class="ne-p"><br></p><h3 id="0e6d1847"><span class="ne-text"></span></h3><p id="feab24bd3b82d2799e2dac6d56957450" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="8675e27ef21c4d6f4e3c390a9039463d" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> P1 -&gt; Pn  n </span></p><p id="04fc31dd56db424542188c800706797c" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="a24b641ae3e9651167024af87187bf28" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text"> P1  Pn  n  mE1 1E2  2 Ei  i (1 &lt;= i &lt;= m)E  </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">(existing resource vector)</span></code><span class="ne-text"></span></p><p id="9d26e86025397b8d6319268fa76a93a3" class="ne-p"><br></p><p id="41f401b08793431302caeb310f9f5076" class="ne-p"><span class="ne-text">C </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">(current allocation matrix)</span></code><span class="ne-text"> R  </span><code class="ne-code"><span class="ne-text">(request matrix)</span></code><span class="ne-text">Ci  Pi Cij  Pi  j Rij  Pi  j </span></p><p id="66cca3aac1c7c3a268bcf0cbe528756c"
